Last_Login_IP, Login_Faild_Count, Login_Faild_Lock_Count, Last_Update_Password_Time, Description, Remark, Create_Date ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterprise_No,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number_Of_Audits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sent_Count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{used_Amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{available_Amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{is_Notify_Report,jdbcType=BIT}, Tcp_Max_Channel = #{record.tcp_Max_Channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},

Sent_Count = #{record.sent_Count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Used_Amount = #{record.used_Amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Available_Amount = #{record.available_Amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

Is_Query_Report = #{record.is_Query_Report,jdbcType=BIT},
Return_Unknown_Rate = #{record.return_Unknown_Rate,jdbcType=REAL},
Notify_Report_Url = #{record.notify_Report_Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
